properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the managed cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: DisableBrowser
properties.help: Don't launch a web browser after establishing port-forwarding.

properties.name: ListenAddress
properties.help: The listening address for the dashboard.

properties.name: ListenPort
properties.help: The listening port for the dashboard.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the managed cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: AadClientAppId
properties.help: The ID of an Azure Active Directory client application of type "Native". This application is for user login via kubectl.

properties.name: AadServerAppId
properties.help: The ID of an Azure Active Directory server application of type "Web app/API". This application represents the managed cluster's apiserver (Server application).

properties.name: AadServerAppSecret
properties.help: The secret of an Azure Active Directory server application.

properties.name: AadTenantId
properties.help: The ID of an Azure Active Directory tenant.

properties.name: AdminUsername
properties.help: User account to create on node VMs for SSH access.

properties.name: AttachAcr
properties.help: Grant the 'acrpull' role assignment to the ACR specified by name or resource ID.

properties.name: ClientSecret
properties.help: Secret associated with the service principal. This argument is required if `--service-principal` is specified.

properties.name: DisableRbac
properties.help: Disable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

properties.name: DnsNamePrefix
properties.help: Prefix for hostnames that are created. If not specified, generate a hostname using the managed cluster and resource group names.

properties.name: DnsServiceIp
properties.help: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service.

properties.name: DockerBridgeAddress
properties.help: A specific IP address and netmask for the Docker bridge, using standard CIDR notation.

properties.name: EnableAddons
properties.help: Enable the Kubernetes addons in a comma-separated list.

properties.name: EnableRbac
properties.help: Enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control. Default: enabled.

properties.name: GenerateSshKeys
properties.help: Generate SSH public and private key files if missing. The keys will be stored in the ~/.ssh directory.

properties.name: KubernetesVersion
properties.help: Version of Kubernetes to use for creating the cluster, such as "1.11.8" or "1.12.6".

properties.name: LoadBalancerManagedOutboundIpCount
properties.help: Load balancer managed outbound IP count.

properties.name: LoadBalancerOutboundIpPrefixes
properties.help: Load balancer outbound IP prefix resource IDs.

properties.name: LoadBalancerOutboundIps
properties.help: Load balancer outbound IP resource IDs.

properties.name: LoadBalancerSku
properties.help: Azure Load Balancer SKU selection for your cluster. basic or standard.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: MaxPods
properties.help: The maximum number of pods deployable to a node.

properties.name: NetworkPlugin
properties.help: The Kubernetes network plugin to use.

properties.name: NetworkPolicy
properties.help: The Kubernetes network policy to use.

properties.name: NoSshKey
properties.help: Do not use or create a local SSH key.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: NodeCount
properties.help: Number of nodes in the Kubernetes node pool. After creating a cluster, you can change the size of its node pool with `az aks scale`.

properties.name: NodeOsdiskSize
properties.help: Size in GB of the OS disk for each node in the node pool. Minimum 30 GB.

properties.name: NodeVmSize
properties.help: Size of Virtual Machines to create as Kubernetes nodes.

properties.name: NodepoolName
properties.help: Node pool name, upto 12 alphanumeric characters.

properties.name: PodCidr
properties.help: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

properties.name: ServiceCidr
properties.help: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs.

properties.name: ServicePrincipal
properties.help: Service principal used for authentication to Azure APIs.

properties.name: SkipSubnetRoleAssignment
properties.help: Skip role assignment for subnet (advanced networking).

properties.name: SshKeyValue
properties.help: Public key path or key contents to install on node VMs for SSH access. For example, 'ssh-rsa AAAAB...snip...UcyupgH azureuser@linuxvm'.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: VmSetType
properties.help: Agent pool vm set type. VirtualMachineScaleSets or AvailabilitySet.

properties.name: VnetSubnetId
properties.help: The ID of a subnet in an existing VNet into which to deploy the cluster.

properties.name: WorkspaceResourceId
properties.help: The resource ID of an existing Log Analytics Workspace to use for storing monitoring data. If not specified, uses the default Log Analytics Workspace if it exists, otherwise creates one.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the managed cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Addons
properties.help: Disable the Kubernetes addons in a comma-separated list.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: SubnetName
properties.help: Name of an existing subnet to use with the virtual-node add-on.

properties.name: WorkspaceResourceId
properties.help: The resource ID of an existing Log Analytics Workspace to use for storing monitoring data.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the managed cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Admin
properties.help: Get cluster administrator credentials.  Default: cluster user credentials.

properties.name: Context
properties.help: If specified, overwrite the default context name.

properties.name: File
properties.help: Kubernetes configuration file to update. Use "-" to print YAML to stdout instead.

properties.name: OverwriteExisting
properties.help: Overwrite any existing cluster entry with the same name.

properties.name: ClientVersion
properties.help: Version of the client to install.

properties.name: InstallLocation
properties.help: Path at which to install DC/OS.

properties.name: AciResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group to create the ACI container groups. Use the MC_\* resource group if it is not specified.

properties.name: ChartUrl
properties.help: URL of a Helm chart that installs ACI Connector.

properties.name: ClientSecret
properties.help: Secret associated with the service principal. This argument is required if `--service-principal` is specified.

properties.name: ConnectorName
properties.help: Name of the ACI Connector.

properties.name: ImageTag
properties.help: The image tag of the virtual kubelet. Use 'latest' if it is not specified.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: The location to create the ACI container groups. Use the location of the MC_\* resource group if it is not specified.

properties.name: OsType
properties.help: Install support for deploying ACIs of this operating system type.

properties.name: ServicePrincipal
properties.help: Service principal used for authentication to Azure APIs.

properties.name: Graceful
properties.help: Use a "cordon and drain" strategy to evict pods safely before removing the ACI node.

properties.name: AadClientAppId
properties.help: The ID of an Azure Active Directory client application. This argument is required if `--reset-aad` is specified.

properties.name: AadServerAppId
properties.help: The ID of an Azure Active Directory server application. This argument is required if `--reset-aad` is specified.

properties.name: AadServerAppSecret
properties.help: The secret of an Azure Active Directory server application. This argument is required if `--reset-aad` is specified.

properties.name: AadTenantId
properties.help: Tenant ID associated with Azure Active Directory.

properties.name: ResetAad
properties.help: Reset Azure Active Directory configuration for a managed cluster.

properties.name: ClientSecret
properties.help: Secret associated with the service principal. This argument is required if `--service-principal` is specified.

properties.name: ResetServicePrincipal
properties.help: Reset service principal for a managed cluster.

properties.name: ServicePrincipal
properties.help: Service principal used for authentication to Azure APIs. This argument is required if `--reset-service-principal` is specified.

properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: KubernetesVersion
properties.help: Version of Kubernetes to upgrade the cluster to, such as "1.11.8" or "1.12.6".

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the managed cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ControlPlaneOnly
properties.help: Upgrade the cluster control plane only. If not specified, both control plane AND all node pools will be upgraded.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: ResourceGroup

properties.name: Space
properties.help: Name of the new or existing dev space to select. Defaults to an interactive selection experience.

properties.name: Update
properties.help: Update to the latest Azure Dev Spaces client components.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation. Requires --space.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the managed cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Created
properties.help: Wait until created with 'provisioningState' at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Deleted
properties.help: Wait until deleted.

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.

properties.name: Updated
properties.help: Wait until updated with provisioningState at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
